name: Brag Document
description: Keep Track of All of Your Accomplishments in One Place and Refer to Them When Needed!Introducing the Notion Brag Document Template, designed to help you keep track and document your accomplishments, project successes, and positive feedback to use as evidence of your value during performance reviews or promotion discussions.With quarterly/yearly views, it'll be easier than ever to share your accomplishments.Spend less time stressing out about having another performance review and more time on hav
